1.title: M.U.B.A.R.

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

1.plot: Pamela joins the group as they set sail for Mexico to avoid the nuclear fallout in the United States, but the problem is none of them knows how to navigate a yacht.

2.title: Stocko Syndome

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

2.plot: Tandy creates a plan to escape from Pamela while the rest of the group discovers a man stranded on an island.

3.title: Skeleton Crew

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

3.plot: Pamela tries to redeem herself as the group finally reaches Mexico.

4.title: Wisconsin

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

4.plot: Carol and Tandy come up with a plan to convince everyone to stick together.

5.title: La Abuela

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

5.plot: The group moves into a mansion that was once owned by an infamous cartel leader.

6.title: Double Cheeseburger

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

6.plot: Tandy feels ready to face the challenge when Carol's pregnancy takes an unexpected turn, but Gail wants to intervene.

7.title: Gender Friender

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

7.plot: Tandy tries to convince everyone he's a feminist.

8.title: Not Appropriate For Miners

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

8.plot: Todd asks Tandy for advice when Jasper begins acting more reckless than usual. In the meantime, Carol and Erica both want Jasper to be their babies suitor.

9.title: Karl

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

9.plot: Tandy and Todd meet a man who's been in a Mexican prison since the virus hit.

10.title: Paint Misbehavin'

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

10.plot: Tandy and Todd introduce Karl to the rest of the group as the search for Jasper continues.

11.title: Hamilton/Berg

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

11.plot: Tandy and Todd try to convince the others that something has to be done about Karl; Jasper remains missing.

12.title: Señor Clean

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

12.plot: Tandy tries to be responsible to earn Gail's approval; Todd gets mad at Melissa for keeping him away from Jasper.

13.title: Release the Hounds

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

13.plot: Todd falls into a deep depression, so the others try to cheer him up.

14.title: Special Delivery

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

14.plot: Todd clashes with Erica, but Melissa is determined to bond with her; Carol thinks a new person may be close.

15.title: Designated Survivors

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

15.plot: Tandy makes a surprising discovery that proves to be positive for the group, but sends Todd into a spiral.

16.title: The Blob

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

16.plot: A thermal heat detector indicates life outside Zihuatenajo, but Tandy is against splitting up the group to investigate.

17.title: Barbara Ann

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

17.plot: The gang are surprised at what they find when they go out in search of what they assume to be a sign of life, while Todd makes a few discoveries of his own back at the mansion.

18.title: Cancun, Baby!

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

18.plot: The gang decides to leave the mansion in Zihuatenajo and find a new place to live, but Tandy has second thoughts.

1.title: Alive in Tucson

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

1.plot: After a deadly virus wipes out humanity, Phil Miller searches the country for more survivors.

2.title: The Elephant in the Room

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

2.plot: Phil discovers he is NOT the last man on earth as he finds Carol, unfortunately they are opposites she is a nerdy clean freak, but beggars can't be choosers.

3.title: Raisin Balls and Wedding Bells

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

3.plot: Phil finally agrees to marry Carol even though he thinks it's rather silly, given that they are the last two people on Earth. Adjusting to married life goes well, until he suddenly runs into the beautiful, and unattached, Melissa.

4.title: Sweet Melissa

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

4.plot: Phil must work fast in order to save human existence.

5.title: Dunk the Skunk

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

5.plot: Phil's efforts to bed Melissa are stopped short by the second last man on earth.

6.title: Some Friggin' Fat Dude

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

6.plot: Carol tries to nudge Todd and Melissa together, while Phil attempts to drive them apart.

7.title: She Drives Me Crazy

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

7.plot: After the confession at the bar with Melissa, Phil grows more annoyed with the presence of Todd. Carol pressures Phil to clean the toilet pool.

8.title: Mooovin' In

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

8.plot: Phil gets a cow to prove to the group that he is worth something after Todd becomes the go-to man. Carol pressures Phil for her to move in with him.

9.title: The Do-Over

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

9.plot: Phil asks god for a do-over, and then two women turn up at that moment. He lies to them and plans to meet them for dinner, and goes back and lies to Carol wanting to have time alone and go camping.

10.title: Pranks for Nothin'

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

10.plot: Phil is outcast after everyone finds out about him telling the new women that his wife is dead.

11.title: Moved to Tampa

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

11.plot: Phil attempts to alter his "Alive in Tucson" signs so no more men will show up, but he ends up marooned on one of his billboards with no one to help.

12.title: The Tandyman Can

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

12.plot: The cul-de-sac has a re-election for President of the United States.

13.title: Screw the Moon

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

13.plot: Tandy realizes that he is super-jealous of New Phil's relationship with Carol, so he decides he must win her back.

1.title: Is There Anybody Out There?

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

1.plot: Carol quickly learns of how wrong her decision was to accompany Phil on his new journey away from Tuscon.

2.title: The Boo

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

2.plot: Phil goes on a search for Carol after he accidentally leaves her in a gas station in Oklahoma.

3.title: Dead Man Walking

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

3.plot: After Carol accidentally kills Gordan, a new addition to the Tuscon Crew, she and Tandy try to find a way to ease themselves back into the group; Carol fakes Tandy's death.

4.title: C to the T

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

4.plot: Phil is welcomed back into the group, but he must face consequences for how he acted in Tuscon.

5.title: Crickets

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

5.plot: Phil finds out Todd's secret in "the house"; Melissa gets a cut on her finger.

6.title: A Real Live Wire

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

6.plot: Phil and Todd rejuvenate their old friendship from Tuscon after doing time together; Phil and Phil 2's growing tension between each other over Carol reaches its tipping point.

7.title: Baby Steps

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

7.plot: When Erica claims she's pregnant to Phil 2 right before he is about to leave Malibu, he has to choose between his unborn child or a higher chance of survival by himself.

8.title: No Bull

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

8.plot: Phil 2 finds himself on Tandy's level when he causes problems with the group.

9.title: Secret Santa

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

9.plot: Along with most human life, the virus wiped out normal traditions and holidays. As Christmas approaches, Carol spearheads a "Secret Santa" gift exchange to spread some festive cheer.

10.title: Silent Night

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

10.plot: Phil is diagnosed with appendicitis. Someone in the group has to step up to execute the surgery. Melissa has to deal with Todd's refusal of her proposal. Mike makes a decision about returning to earth.

11.title: Pitch Black

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

11.plot: Mike Miller makes it to Earth and befriends a man who has waited out the virus in a boat.

12.title: Valhalla

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

12.plot: The gang has a funeral for Phil #2 and try to recover. "Tandy" tells Carol about Todd and Gail.

13.title: Fish in the Dish

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

13.plot: Phil worries he might be sterile, and Todd worries when all the women in the group come on to him.

14.title: Skidmark

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

14.plot: Phil finds out that his brother is alive and Todd has some issues with the ladies

15.title: Fourth Finger

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

15.plot: Phil deals with Mikes pranks, and Todd is too honest with his two lovers.

16.title: Falling Slowly

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

16.plot: Mike decides to be the father of Phil and Carols baby, and excludes Todd from the position. Meanwhile Phil is worried Carol will fall for Mike.

17.title: Smart and Stupid

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

17.plot: Todd feels left out, as Tandy warms to having his little brother back on Earth. Meanwhile, Mike learns more about Erica than the group has ever uncovered about her.

18.title: 30 Years of Science Down the Tubes

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

18.plot: After Mike sneaks away, Phil goes out alone to find Mike.

1.title: General Breast Theme with Cobras

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

1.plot: The group is in danger when armed intruders storm the beach near their Malibu home.

2.title: The Wild Guess Express

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

2.plot: Todd is feeling awful over recent actions, so Tandy tells a few white lies to cheer him up.

3.title: You're All Going to Diet

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

3.plot: Tandy sets up an alarm system in the house, only to learn that Melissa has already done so, then the group decides to enjoy a change of scenery.

4.title: Five Hoda Kotbs

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

4.plot: The gang goes to war with each other on a post-apocalyptic road trip.

5.title: The Power of Power

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

5.plot: The group continues searching for a new place to live, while the triangle between Todd, Gail and Melissa gets more complicated.

6.title: The Open-Ended Nature of Unwitnessed Deaths

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

6.plot: Tandy wants to learn about Lewis' past, while Carol asks Gail a favor and Todd helps Melissa deal with her mental state.

7.title: Mama's Hideaway

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

7.plot: Carol will stop at nothing to get the perfect family photo. In the meantime, Melissa has her own mission, Lewis looks for a new hobby and Gail ends up in a scary situation.

8.title: Whitney Houston, We Have a Problem

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

8.plot: The group sets off to find Melissa when they find a note she left saying "Goodbye". In the meantime, Gail has her own adventure.

9.title: If You're Happy and You Know It

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

9.plot: Carol is feeling depressed about Gail's absence so Tandy takes her on the honeymoon vacation they never had.

10.title: Got Milk?

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

10.plot: The beginning of the viral outbreak is revealed.

11.title: The Spirit of St. Lewis

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

11.plot: Lewis goes on a solo adventure as Melissa plays mind games with the group after being locked up for her own safety.

12.title: Hair of the Dog

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

12.plot: Todd and Tandy look into Melissa's past before the virus to find answers about her illness, while Carol gets a new outlook on life.

13.title: Find This Thing We Need To

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

13.plot: Carol enlists Tandy and Erica to help find answers when she makes a shocking discovery. In the meantime, Todd has a breakthrough with Melissa.

14.title: Point Person Knows Best

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

14.plot: Tandy tries to take charge of a situation unfolding within the group, while Carol becomes suspicious of Todd's behavior.

15.title: Name 20 Picnics... Now!

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

15.plot: The gang throws a party for every major holiday, but a rough patch between Tandy and Todd threatens the fun.

16.title: The Big Day

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

16.plot: Tandy and Gail have a disagreement.

17.title: When the Going Gets Tough

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

17.plot: The consequences of surviving an apocalypse begin to impact the group.

18.title: Nature's Horchata

episode of.title: The Last Man on Earth (TV Series 2015–2018)

18.plot: A new problem arises for our survivors and they decide to take to the sea, when a couple of unexpected guests crash the party.

locations: 11847 Peak Road, Chatsworth, California, USA::(Phil's home in Tucson, Arizona)
imdb.plot outline: This is the story about the life and adventures of the last man on Earth. Phil Miller was once just an average guy who loved his family and hated his job at the bank - now he's humanity's last hope. Will he ever find another person alive on the planet? Would hoping that she is a female be asking too much?
imdb.title: The Last Man on Earth
plot: Almost two years after a virus wiped out most of the human race, Phil Miller only wishes for some company, but soon gets more than he bargained for when that company shows up in the form of other survivors.::Benjamin Rothrock

This is the story about the life and adventures of the last man on Earth. Phil Miller was once just an average guy who loved his family and hated his job at the bank - now he's humanity's last hope. Will he ever find another person alive on the planet? Would hoping that she is a female be asking too much?::FOX
